state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, head north. And then, make an attempt to go east. With that done, go east. Next, move south. Then, attempt to travel west. Then, try to take a trip west. With that done, go north. After that, head north. Then, head east. Following that, make an attempt to go to the north. After that, head west. That done, make an attempt to go south. That done, go east. And then, travel south. With that over with, lift the coin from the floor of the cellar. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Vault =- You're now in the vault. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Vault =-0/1
